metadata.synopsis: Wyll reacts to finding Ravengard dead in his cell.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Wyll sees Ravengard dead in the Iron Throne. This happens only when the Mizora Pact scene has never played and Wyll is a party member and enters the room Ravengard is held in.

0.speaker: Wyll
0.text: Father? Gods, no. I'm so sorry...
0.context: NodeContext: Wyll reacts to finding his father's body, dead by reasons yet unknown.
